column4: i am connected to the internet now, how do i update etc? i have chagned software sources to autoupdate n stuff, but how do i know if its done it or not?
if you see no error it is ok
sudo aptitude update && sudo aptitude dust-upgrade && sudo aptitude install gufw (but mostly sure you do not need a firewall)
linux is a very secure kernel, and ubuntu is secure also, don't be so paranoid, you do not need a firewall
